name: Mango Training and Consultancy Sdn Bhd
description: Mango Training & Consultancy was formed in 2011 to provide genuine needs based language and soft skills training in Malaysia and South East Asia. Trainers at Mango are not simply experienced trainers- but trainers with experience of working in the Malaysian context. Our key concept is – ‘Making training fruitful’: training that delivers real results. We believe in working closely with our clients to ensure that our training matches their expectations as closely as possible.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency

Highlights.name: Customized Training
Highlights.description: Mango Training doesn't offer a one-size-fits-all approach. They begin by conducting a needs analysis to identify the specific skill gaps within your team or organization

Highlights.name: Diverse Business Skills

Highlights.name: Focus on Results:
